page.title: 13Hobbies & Pastimes(Robin,11)
page.content: My main interest is drawing. I like drawing because when I'm bored I just look out the window, and there's something for me to draw. Sometimes I draw out of my own imagination and sometimes draw out of comics and books. I like drawing cars, motor bikes and lorries. My favourite subjects are space pictures and aliens from other galaxies. Other people's Hobbies, interests and pastimes, things like: collecting stamps, postcards, rubbers, comic books, posters, old model cars, Airfix, and computer games. Some peo- ple like photography and bird-watching. One or two people here like trains and train spotting. A lot of people like pop groups like Wham! and Duran Duran which I like as well. People go to their concerts to watch them play, and scream like anything at them, because they like them.
